ESRS reference
ESRS 2 paragraph 40; ESRS 1 paragraph 137 and Appendix C: List of phased-in Disclosure
Requirements
Key terms
Sector-breakdown
Background
ESRS 2 paragraph 40 states: ‘The undertaking shall disclose the following information about the
key elements of its general strategy that relate to or affect sustainability matters: . . . (b) a
breakdown of total revenue, as included in its financial statements, by significant ESRS sectors.’
